version_description:
BeautyCam is updated! You can be more beautiful!

-Updated video effects. Capture those memorable moments.
-Now you could turn off the "bling" sound effect in the settings
-Supports silent mode when your phone is muted.

If you have any questions, please go to "Feedbacks" and tell us!

BeautyCam 4.5.0 – you, too, can become Angelababy!
-Brand new darkened corners and blur effects to emphasize contrast and make you the focus of every photo!
-Selfie effects can now be set to random, let the camera read your mind and be different for every frame.
-New Filter "Summer" adds a dash of freshness to your selfies. Discover your style through our list of filters!

Not satisfied? Tap "Feedback" and send your comments our way!

BeautyCam 4.6.0 Critical update! Professional selfies, for better expression of yourself.
1. Full screen selfies newly released, capture your beauty with no dead corner. Be capricious to occupy the screen!
2. Shutter sound can be turned off now! No more worrying about being noticed when acting cute, free to selfie at any time and place!
Tips: Shutter sound can be turned off in "Settings - Camera Settings".
3. New MV effect [POP-Girl] for video-shooting! Make instant transformations into cover girls and shoot your own blockbusters!

Any unsatisfaction or suggestion, please feel free to reflect to our technicians in "Feedback".

BeautyCam V4.6.5 updates:
1.A new shutter button specially designed for the filter menu. Choose your favorite filter as you snap.
2.Delete photos directly from BeautyCam to free up your phone memory space, iOS 8.0 or higher required. (Select the pictures in Album, click to button at the bottom left corner to delete)
3.Bug fixes and performance improvements.

BeautyCam V4.6.6 updates:
1.A new shutter button specially designed for the filter menu. Choose your favorite filter as you snap.
2.Delete photos directly from BeautyCam to free up your phone memory space, iOS 8.0 or higher required. (Select the pictures in Album, click to button at the bottom left corner to delete)
3.Bug fixes and performance improvements.

Experience our newly added features in BeautyCam 4.7.0~
Come experience our new functions in "Beautify"!
Blur effects - Focus on what you want to be seen by choosing from different blurring effects.
Nose shapes - edit the shape of your nose and look better than ever.

Experience our newly added features in BeautyCam 4.7.1~
Come experience our new functions in "Beautify"!
Blur effects - Focus on what you want to be seen by choosing from different blurring effects.
Nose shapes - edit the shape of your nose and look better than ever.

Experience our newly added features in BeautyCam 4.7.2~
Come experience our new functions in "Beautify"!
Blur effects - Focus on what you want to be seen by choosing from different blurring effects.
Nose shapes - edit the shape of your nose and look better than ever.

BeautyCam Summer Updates! 
【New Updates for Makeup Function】
1. Group makeup newly added! No more worries when you want nude makeup but your friend likes Korean makeup, group makeup will satisfy each of your unique preference all at once. 
2. More natural makeup effect with partial removing function. Offer you just-as-real makeup experience. 
BeautyCam satisfies all your needs for beauty. Let us brighten your summer days. 
Feel free to leave your questions and suggestions to our technicians in the "Feedback".

Take photo stickers with your phone using BeautyCam!
Have you ever envied Sailor Moon and her buddies for their huge sparkly eyes?
Update! Right! Now! Try out fun and adorable photo stickers with anime-style effects on your phone! Invite your friends to unlock effects for a chance to print out your very own customized anime-style photo stickers!
Let our technicians know about any problems or suggestions through our feedback section!

1. New effects of PikaPika are right on BeautyCam!
Attention! New elements are approaching!! Get ready to be cooler and cuter!
2. The new templates you’ve desired for so long are upcoming! Chic collage and classic single frame will make you out of ordinary.
3. PikaPika into Sailor Moon! Have a charm campaign with your bestie.
    PikaPika with starry eyes. Show off love with your sweetie.
    PikaPika to be a lovable weepy cutie with adorable pets.

It’s a sweet edition of BeautyCam !
Come meet a better self with National Sweetheart Zhao Liying!
Super cute effect Bunny created by fans is about to sweep on the internet!

BeautyCam Holidays Exclusive Update!

1. The super popular PikaPika function has become even better!
Try out our new [Anime PikaPika] and enjoy an adorable and fun anime experience! With our story templates: comedic, glamorous, amusing and more—you can fulfill your dreams of becoming the main character of an anime!
2. Exclusive PikaPika Christmas Pack!
Use it with our new hair beautification effects so that you could look your best from head to toe!

Look stunning while celebrating Christmas and the New Year with BeautyCam!

>>Whole-new function SelfieGacha is about to amaze you!
1. [Exclusive technology] Simply take a selfie and tap the button! Ta-da! Creating your own customized animation is that simple.
2. [Creative selfies] Want your selfies be more eyecatching? No worries! SelfieGacha helps you bestride social media.
3. [Transcend dimensions with your cuteness] Adorable, cool, extravagant... choose between different locations in a variety of styles and transform into a new you!
4.[Booming red looks]New lucky looks for PikaPika in the new year! Try out [Lucky cat], [Bloosom], [Ribbon] and boost your new year fortune!

>>Recent updates:
[Manga PikaPika] A huge selection of story templates, including crazy plot twists, hilarious developments, and lovey-dovey scenes! Your selfies now tell a story!
[New ethereal makeup looks] New makeup styles such as "Seraph" and "Snowy" will transform you into the Princess of Frost! Will you find your prince as well?

==>>Couple Makeup like you've never seen before!
Give you and your friends different makeup styles in the same frame! Take sweet selfies and share kisses with hotties! Snap a pic with your besties and enjoy hilarious effects!

==>>Recent updates
[“Dizzy” fever] “Dizzy” effect is now all the rage among Japanese youngsters! Come and try out the irresistible anime magic.
[SelfieGacha] Say goodbye to awkwardness in photos! Use SelfieGacha to receive an animated sticker full of actions and emotions in just one tap!
[Manga PikaPika] A huge selection of story templates, including crazy plot twists, hilarious developments, and lovey-dovey scenes! Your selfies now tell a story!

BeautyCam has become even better now!
Have you tried the most popular animated hair effect?
+Wow! Wow! Wow! The new hair hand-drawn effect will give your hair anime-like elegance and smooth. 
+New mode for PikaPika! No need to choose templates if you don’t want to. Simpler operation but cuter selfies.

BeautyCam has become even better now!
Have you tried the most popular animated hair effect?
+Wow! Cute PikaPika will surprise you with new hand-drawn hair in some filters，which will give your hair anime-like elegance and smooth.
+New mode for PikaPika! No need to choose templates if you don’t want to. Simpler operation but cuter selfies.

BeautyCam’s amazing New Arrival for this summer!
The first #Selfie Carnie# on the market is coming! A kind of unique and charming magic that you will never let go! Welcome to BeautyCam, let's enjoy endless happiness of AR Carnie this summer!
+ Wow! Amazing AR Carnie is meeting its grand debut! Various themed venues; beautiful, cute, cool or funny, you could tag yourself as you like! This is the new selfie we want!
+ Brand-new #My personalized beauty#, customize your own beauty!

BeautyCam’s amazing New Arrival for this summer!
The first #Selfie Carnie# on the market is coming! A kind of unique and charming magic that you will never let go! Welcome to BeautyCam, let's enjoy endless happiness of AR Carnie this summer!
+ Wow! Amazing AR Carnie is meeting its grand debut! Various themed venues; beautiful, cute, cool or funny, you could tag yourself as you like! This is the new selfie we want!
+ Brand-new #My personalized beauty#, customize your own beauty!

+New venue: "FunParty"! A combination of selfies and game elements enables you to have fun while snapping amazing pics. Can you beat your friends and snag first place on the leaderboard?
+"My Beauty Moments" have been added to your personal account center, where you can view all the pics you shared with your friends in the past 7 days. Time waits for no one. Share your pics now!
+Our technicians have brought more optimizations to the app. Enjoy your improved selfie experience!

1.AR selfie welcomes its new updates! New delightful effects and fresh ideas are all so summer style! BeautyCam will let you know how interesting selfies could be!
2.Our technicians have further optimized the beauty effects. You will reach the full level of beauty instantly!

1.[Optimization] Further selfie optimization are made by our technicians to level up your beauty!
2.[Surprise] BeautyCam's Fourth Anniversary Party is on the way! Do not miss it!

BeautyCam offers beauty of all kinds!

Ding ding! Lovelies, your BeautyCam has been updated, and what an update it is! The brand has been fully upgraded, offering amazing selfie experiences for cool fashionistas like you. You want it, we have it! Let's check out what new features we've got, shall we?
[Newly upgraded facial enhancement effects]
Our brand-new facial enhancement algorithm will help you snap selfies that are more beautiful than ever! Tons of Japanese / Korean magazine-styled filters have been added. Become a cover girl in an instant—you can do it!
[Real-time makeup effects]
Real-time makeup effects have been added. You can now snap selfies while seeing makeup effects appear on your face at the same time! It's just like magic! You can even select your face shape, and related styles such as cute, hipster and mature, all made possible with just one tap. We also offer all-new makeup style categories, for example categories for girly girls, bffs, office-chic ladies and boyfriend styles. Use these makeup themes to show off your versatility!
[Heaps of facial enhancement materials]
We've added a new DIY facial enhancement venue, where you can customize your very own materials! Download your favorite filters, makeup styles and animated stickers all at once, making your selfie-taking experience one-of-a-kind and more convenient than ever!

If you run into any issues you'd like us to know about, please don't hesitate to contact us! Our tech guys are online 24/7 waiting to serve you!

1. [Customize] feature has been optimized. All settings will now be saved automatically, so you don't have to adjust anything next time when you take a picture.
2. To keep the mole or not to keep the mole—that's the question! We've added a toggle for the [Mole] function. You may toggle it on or off at [Profile] - [Customized Beauty]!

Christmas & New Year: Specially designed effects have been prepared for your Christmas and New Year!
Primary mode: No skin smoothing, keep the glow of your inherent beauty.
Male makeup effect: Now you can turn off makeup effects for male in settings!

Video function:
1.Hot music has been added to spice up your videos. Shoot a video and choose your soundtrack.
2.The anti-shake function is live! Save photos from unwanted movements of the camera.
3.Now you can take 15-second videos by holding the camera button. More wonderful contents can be saved.

Optimization: New technology has been adopted to fix image distortion.
Compatibility: Image quality has been enhanced for 9:16 ratio in iPhone 11 series.
Slender: Now you can use features in Slender for your videos! Best composition tips for best full body shots!

1.Adjust head-to-shoulder ratio for the person holding the camera in a selfie. Never be too afraid to get close to the camera again! 
2.Optimization: You can now enable or disable the face slimming effect when importing a photo.
3.Optimization: Cosmetic lenses effect will no longer be automatically applied. The image quality has also been improved.
4.Snap a sweet photo with the person next to you!
Themed effects are provided to make the most of SUMMER!

Optimization: Blur effect has been optimized to make awesome alterations to full body photos.

Real-Time Retouching: A new feature has been added to enable a smooth facial contour retouching effect.
Search: Now you can find any effect in the Style module by searching for a keyword.
Camera Interface: Now you can easily switch between the front and rear cameras by double tapping.
